title: usb-c earbuds stopped being recognized
content:
I have usb-c earbuds that came with my pixel 3 phone and I am also using them with ThinkPad docking/laptop. 
I left them connected to the laptop during one of the firmware updates for the docking.
Now my earbuds are recognized as "ThinkPad USB-C Dock Gen2 USB Audio" and wouldn't properly work anymore.

Is there any way to reset the earbuds?
